com.yuceturkomer.hw07

Class CustomerQueueSim

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yuceturkomer.hw07.CustomerQueueSim

  • public class CustomerQueueSim
extends java.lang.Object
    The class which includes methods for simulating the customer queue. The customerLinkedList is a list that holds whole data from file (not sorted) runSim method creates a new PriorityQueue and works around it

      • runSim

        public void runSim()
        Calls runSim(int) method.

      • runSim

        public void runSim(int rangeAsHours)
        Simulates the Customer queue and gives an output to the console or the file according to the rangeAsHour param. Creates a new priority queue. Holds an initial time, and current time as well as inital and current customers If customerLinkedList is empty then immediately returns. Continues until both priorityQueue and customerLinkedList are empty.
        Parameters:
        rangeAsHours - If its a non-negative number, it takes inputs from input file redirects the output to a file named "part1data2.txt" within the interval of initial and given hour. If its a negative number, then it takes inputs from input file redirects the output to the standart output.

      • minForm

        public int minForm(int hour,
                   int minute)
        Takes hour and minute values, converts it to the minute form integer and returns it
        Parameters:
        hour - Hour input
        minute - Minute input
        Returns:
        minute form of given h:m

      • hourMinStr

        public java.lang.String hourMinStr(int minform)
        Takes the h:m as minute value and converts it to String form and returns it
        Parameters:
        minform - Minute form of given h:m
        Returns:
        "Hour : Minute" string format of given minute value
